If you liked this, you?ll enjoy A New Earth, also by Tolle.

Extended recommendations, Marshall Rosenberg and Daniel Quinn.
This book has superseded the Bhagavad Gita.  The language is simple and readily understood by anyone but a refuser not wanting to know who they really are. The Power is Now!
Thanks!. I'm looking for the "God Without Religion" by Sankara Saranam. Pease upload if you find.
